scripts.build: bun build ./lib/uint32.ts --outdir ./build --entry-naming uint32.js && bun build ./lib/uint32.ts --outdir ./build --minify --entry-naming uint32.min.js && bun build ./lib/uint64.ts --outdir ./build --entry-naming uint64.js && bun build ./lib/uint64.ts --outdir ./build --minify --entry-naming uint64.min.js
